backend/main.mo: Main backend actor that includes the MixinStorage module from blob-storage, providing blob storage functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: loading screen, photo gallery, purchase information display, and automotive showroom design theme with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing the loading screen, car gallery, card components, styling, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining an automotive-themed color palette using OKLCH colors for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with title 'Auto Shop' and root div mounting point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that displays LoadingScreen for 2.5 seconds on mount, then transitions to CarGallery.
frontend/src/components/CarCard.tsx: Reusable card component displaying individual car or engine items with image, badge, description, price, and action buttons (Buy Now and Details).
frontend/src/components/CarGallery.tsx: Main gallery component with header, filter buttons (All/Cars/Engines), grid of CarCard components displaying 6 hardcoded inventory items, and footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Full-screen loading component with 'AUTO SHOP' branding, animated spinner, and decorative gradient background elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Minimal placeholder file for backend queries with a single useBackendHealth hook that checks actor readiness; notes that data is currently managed client-side.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a premium automotive color palette for both light and dark modes, including metallic charcoal, silver, and chrome accent colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers for state management and authentication.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom colors mapped to CSS variables, Inter font family, custom border radius, premium shadows, and animation keyframes for accordion and sidebar components.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the Auto Shop app's features including loading screen, car/engine photo gallery, purchase information display, and automotive showroom design theme with required image specifications.
